item.description:
The October meeting of the Boston MySQL User Group is going to be another informal pay-your-own dinner at John Harvard's Brew Pub.

Sorry for the late notice; however I realized that Monday is a holiday and folks may or may not be around....besides, the informal dinners have been fun in the past!

To RSVP anonymously, please login to the Meetup site with the e-mail address "admin at sheeri dot com" and the password "guest".

For more information, see: http://mysql.meetup.c...
item.name: The Boston MySQL October Meetup
